solution_line_template: From all the computers, {total_percentage}% - {waiting_percentage}% - {unfixable_percentage}% = {fixed_right_away_percentage}% got fixed right away.
So John was able to fix {fixed_right_away_fraction} * {total_computers} = <<{fixed_right_away_fraction}*{total_computers}={computers_fixed_right_away}>>{computers_fixed_right_away} computers.
